trustfund:
TF010337-CAR - Education Sector Program
            Phase II,TF092126-CAR CATALYTIC FUND PROGRAM PREPARATION,TF093956-CENTRAL AFRICAN REPUBLIC
            EFA-FTI GRANT I,TF094751-CAR - EFA FTI EDUCATION SECTOR
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Education for All - Fast Track
            Initiative Education Sector Development Project for Central
            African Republic grant will contribute to the implementation
            of phase one of the Government National Education Strategy
            (2008-2011), and aims to improve access to better quality
            primary education. The extension is necessary to provide the
            Ministry of Primary and Secondary Education and Literacy the
            additional time to complete the civil works program,
            particularly the portion of the program that has been
            delegated to Agence d'Execution de Travaux
            d'Interet Publique (AGETIP) for management. In
            addition, it will allow the 2010-2012 teacher cohorts to
            graduate in September 2012. Ministry of Primary and
            Secondary Education and Literacy (MEPSA) has put in place an
            action plan to complete the project fully; particularly it
            has discussed and agreed with AGETIP on an execution
            schedule based on the Bank's findings during the July
            2011 implementation support mission. This will be the first
            extension of the project.
